document_data.caption: A map of Oman's Isle showing Ramshorn on the southeast coast.
document_data.name: Ramshorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Ramshorn''' was a small village located on [[Oman's Isle]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The village was located along the southeastern coast of Oman's Isle along the [[Strait of Oman]]. Ramshorn sat on the southerwest edge of an unnamed marsh.
document_data.History: The village was reduced to ruins after [[giant]]s passed through the region during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
